data.text:
@Tazzz089 If you contact them by email, please provide the information in the email as follows
1. Full name
2. Reservation code with 6 digits
3. Travel date
4. Your route
5. Your request
@alizatithphit In this case, you can send an email to ropretrotg@thaiairways.com for assistance.

@watercove We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. (You can contact them by email as well.)

@Tazzz089 We would like to inform you that as our social media team we do not have authorized to access the information. Our staff will contact you in the queue. Please wait for contact from our staff again.
@Tazzz089 Due to the large number of people who contact us, our staff will contact you in the queue. Please wait for contact from our staff again. We apologize for the inconvenience.

@Tazzz089 As our THAI office has a large number of contacts. We suggest that you contact them again later or contact them by email, we are sorry for the inconvenience.

Please note, that the office has available in business hours 9.00-17.00 Monday-Friday.
@diljot_msi And, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.

@diljot_msi The booking that is made by the travel agency, if the passengers would like to cancel, they have to contact the travel agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system.
@Rosetta16516619 We would like to inform you that we are still operating as normal. We are not bankrupt.
@Oh30S Greetings. We will reply to you via Direct Message for your inquiry.

@Aalimnazier Due to the high volume of incoming requests, we seek your kind understanding and patience that our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to you. Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to. Thank you.
@RuchinMehrotra In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order for assistance.
@dhruv_9211 Our staff will contact you in the queue. Please wait for contact with our staff again. We apologize for the inconvenience.
@RuchinMehrotra And, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.

@RuchinMehrotra The booking that is made by the travel agency, if the passengers would like to cancel, they have to contact the travel agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system.
@mylesfdo Due to the large number of people who contact us, our staff will contact you in the queue. It will take about 180 working days.
@dhruv_9211 Due to the large number of people who contact us, our staff will contact you in the queue. Please wait for contact from our staff again. We apologize for the inconvenience.
@dhruv_9211 We suggest that you delete your booking information for security reasons.

data.text: @mylesfdo Due to the high volume of incoming requests, we seek your kind understanding and patience that our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to you. Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to. Thank you.
@diljot_msi @airline Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket. We suggest that you contact your agency directly.

@RuchinMehrotra Hello, Ruchin. In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency directly in order to make any alterations to your ticket.

@diljot_msi Passengers who booked their tickets through travel agencies are advised to contact their agents for assistance. The travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.
@BobVanEs Hello, Bob. If you have a Gold member we suggest that you send an email to ropgold@thaiairways.com for your request.
@diljot_msi Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

@JustDrew_2 @ThaiAirwaysAust @go2Thailand @ThailandFanClub @staralliance If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for your unpleasant experience with our services.

@JustDrew_2 Greetings, we are sorry to inform you that a refund amount will be calculated and settled by issuing office at least 180 days from the submission of your request. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

#ThaiAirways #Winter #ComingSoon https://t.co/WgcvTuPOTk
